title: Advyon - Legal Tech Platform
description: Modern legal-tech platform delivering case management, document workflows, community discussions, and integrated AI assistance.
longDescription: A comprehensive legal-tech solution built with React 19, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. Features include case management, document workflows, community discussions, and AI-powered assistance. Uses Zustand for state management and TanStack Query for data fetching.

title: Advyon Server
description: Backend API service for the Advyon legal-tech platform with authentication, case management, and document handling.

title: Skill Paradox
description: A skill development and learning platform with frontend and backend components for educational content delivery.

title: Skill Paradox Backend
description: RESTful API backend for the Skill Paradox learning platform with user management and content delivery.

title: IELTS Paradox
description: An IELTS preparation application built with Java, featuring practice tests and learning modules using OOP principles.

title: IELTS Paradox (Web)
description: Web version of the IELTS exam preparation platform with enhanced features and accessibility.

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game implementation with a clean UI and game logic.

title: C++ Code
description: Collection of C++ programs demonstrating data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques.

title: Python Code
description: Various Python scripts showcasing automation, scripting, and programming fundamentals.
